wi wikuna ganimedi athi dushkaratha manga hara dena men aya adala baladharingen illa siti.emenma rajaye wi miladi ganna sthana idiripita dina ganan hayar kuli gewagena traktar natharakaragena sitimata wada gedaratama awith wi geniyana paudgalika wi mol karuwanta wi labadima pahasu bawada aya kiya siti.

ee yatathe buddhagayawedi sidu kala katina pinkamedi pradhana dayakathwaya kolambaa sentral beyarings saha yanthropakarana samagame kalamanakara adhyaksha sudath thennakon mahatha saha ema mahathmiya wana sandhya thennakon mahathmiya athulu du daruwan wisin usulanu labe.wisheshayen buddhagaya shri maha bodhi wihara parishraya thula anagarika dharmapalathumange shri namaya anusmaranaya karanu was suwishala dharma shalawak sudath thennakon mathithuman wisin sada nima karawana lada athara ema dharma mandiraya wiwrutha kirimada ikuth 9 wanada saha 10 wanada sidu karini.janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mathithuma mema wasare pebarawari masayedi dambaadiwa buddhagaya shuddha bhu®miya wandana kirimata giya awasthawedi mulgala thaba pilisakara kara koti sankhyatha mudalak waya kara idikarawana lada dharma mandiraya katina pinkamata samagamiwa wiwrutha kerini.ehidi puja karana lada katina chiwaraya kolambaa di. es. senanayaka widyalaya asala sita alankara peraharakin sambodhi wiharaya wetha ikuth 19 wanada wadamawa mahinda rajapaksha mathithumage surathin sambodhi wiharaye thanpath karawana ladde merata sadahawath janathawata da eya daka bala wanda puda ganimata awasthawa salasamini.nawa mulagandha kuti wiharaye sidukarena katina chiwara pinkamata adala katina chiwaraya wisheshagnya waidya kamani mayadunna mahathmiya saha ruklantha mayadunna mahatha wisin wadama karawana ladaha.
